conclusion: The initial altitude of the missile is 0 m.
The final altitude of the missile is 5000 m.
The initial velocity of the missile is 0 m/s.
The acceleration of the missile is 100 m/s^2.
The cosine of the angle of gas expulsion is 1/11.
The mass of the missile is 100 kg.
The horizontal and vertical accelerations of the missile during curvilinear motion are a_x and a_y.
Calculate the time taken by the missile to reach the altitude of 5000 m using the equation of motion.
Time taken to reach 5000 m is 10 s.
Calculate the velocity of the missile at the altitude of 5000 m using the equation of motion.
Calculate the horizontal acceleration of the missile during curvilinear motion using the cosine of the angle.
Calculate the vertical acceleration of the missile during curvilinear motion using the sine of the angle.
